item.title: Judy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You have to participate relentlessly in the manifestation of your own blessings." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Judy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "to travel is worth any cost or sacrifice." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Judy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "You were given life; it is your duty (and also your entitlement as a human being) to find something beautiful within life, no matter how slight." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Judy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "To find the balance you want, this is what you must become. You must keep your feet grounded so firmly on the earth that it's like you have 4 legs instead of 2. That way, you can stay in the world. But you must stop looking at the world through your head. You must look through your heart, instead. That way, you will know God." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Judy add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Learning how to discipline your speech is a way of preventing your energies from spilling out of you through the rupture of your mouth, exhausting you and filling the world with words, words, words instead of serenity, peace and bliss." -- Elizabeth Gilbert
